        John: Brave, loyal, and determined. Struggles with trust issues due to past betrayals.

      [new-story-progress]
        John cautiously entered the dark cave, his hand gripping the hilt of his sword. The air was damp and musty, and the only sound was the echoing of his footsteps. As he ventured deeper, a faint light caught his eye. He approached, finding a small chamber illuminated by glowing crystals embedded in the walls.

        In the center of the room stood Alice, her figure cast in an eerie blue light. John tensed, remembering their last encounter and the unanswered questions that lingered between them. "What are you doing here?" he asked, his voice steady despite his unease.

        Alice turned to face him, an enigmatic smile playing on her lips. "Ah, John. Always in the right place at the right time," she purred. "I've been waiting for you."
      [new-story-progress]"
    </example>
  </output-format>
